class_cards.name: Brawler
class_cards.description: Close-range melee expert.

class_cards.name: Shieldbearer
class_cards.description: Master of shields, providing extra protection.
class_cards.passive: Blocks 3 damage once per turn.

class_cards.name: Bladewind
class_cards.description: Frenzied blade attacker with swift strikes.
class_cards.passive: Gains +5 attack for 1 turn on enter.

class_cards.name: Stonebreaker
class_cards.description: Crushes through enemy defenses.
class_cards.passive: Ignores 25% of enemy defense.

class_cards.name: Rubble Knight
class_cards.description: Clad in salvaged armor, durable yet unrefined.

class_cards.name: Ashstrider
class_cards.description: A fiery warrior fueled by burning resolve.
class_cards.passive: Burns enemy for 5 damage per turn for 2 turns.

class_cards.name: Null Warden
class_cards.description: Suppresses enemy magic and passives.
class_cards.passive: Disables enemy passives for 1 turn.

class_cards.name: Bloodfang
class_cards.description: A feral attacker that heals with every strike.
class_cards.passive: Heals 3 HP after each attack.

class_cards.name: Iron Sentinel
class_cards.description: A near-impregnable defender at the front.
class_cards.passive: Blocks all damage if enemy attack is lower than defense.

class_cards.name: Venom Adept
class_cards.description: Specializes in poisonous strikes to weaken foes.
class_cards.passive: Inflicts poison dealing 5 damage per turn for 2 turns.

class_cards.name: Pit Brawler
class_cards.description: An arena bruiser with relentless attack force.

class_cards.name: Sentinel Guard
class_cards.description: A vigilant protector who counters enemy blows.
class_cards.passive: Redirects 3 damage from one attack.

class_cards.name: Frost Reaver
class_cards.description: Chills and shatters foes with icy strikes.
class_cards.passive: Freezes target for 1 turn on hit.

class_cards.name: Junk Knight
class_cards.description: Wears salvaged gear to endure harsh battles.

class_cards.name: Torchbearer
class_cards.description: Ignites the battlefield with searing flames.
class_cards.passive: Burns enemy for 3 damage for 2 turns.

class_cards.name: Steel Vindicator
class_cards.description: Fights in retribution with a hardened will.
class_cards.passive: Gains 5 defense when HP falls below 20.

class_cards.name: Pike Shard
class_cards.description: Trained in the art of polearm combat.

class_cards.name: Warborn Monk
class_cards.description: Channeling unarmed fury with disciplined strikes.
class_cards.passive: First attack each turn is free.

class_cards.name: Forge Defender
class_cards.description: Stalwart protector that fortifies the front line.
class_cards.passive: Grants 3 defense to an ally once per turn.

class_cards.name: Sunblade
class_cards.description: Empowered by radiant light for devastating strikes.
class_cards.passive: Reflects 5 damage to attackers once per turn.

class_cards.name: Void Dancer
class_cards.description: Slips between dimensions to avoid harm.
class_cards.passive: 50% chance to dodge the first incoming attack.

class_cards.name: Cragslayer
class_cards.description: Mountain-trained brute that smashes through defenses.
class_cards.passive: Deals 3 splash damage on attack.

class_cards.name: Ashguard
class_cards.description: A resilient fighter clad in cinders, mitigating burning effects.
class_cards.passive: Reduces fire damage taken by half.

class_cards.name: Skulltide
class_cards.description: Draws strength from fallen allies to boost its might.
class_cards.passive: Gains +3 attack if an ally died last turn.

class_cards.name: Chain Rattler
class_cards.description: Wields spiked chains with raw aggression.

class_cards.name: Gravemauler
class_cards.description: Hardened by the weight of death, impervious to toxins.
class_cards.passive: Immune to poison and burn effects.

class_cards.name: Dust Howler
class_cards.description: A desert fighter harnessing the ferocity of shifting sands.
class_cards.passive: Reduces terrain penalties by 2.

class_cards.name: Sootbound
class_cards.description: A rugged warrior covered in coal dust.

class_cards.name: Weld Beast
class_cards.description: A hybrid fighter fueled by molten fury.
class_cards.passive: Deals an extra 2 fire damage to adjacent units.

class_cards.name: Nightdrifter
class_cards.description: An elusive fighter skilled in shadow assaults.
class_cards.passive: Negates the first enemy card effect each turn.

class_cards.name: Storm Seer
class_cards.description: Foresees destructive patterns with uncanny precision.
class_cards.passive: Boosts allied attack by 5 for 1 turn every 3 turns.

class_cards.name: Soulshifter
class_cards.description: Replaces a fallen ally with itself in dire circumstances.
class_cards.passive: Revives one fallen ally with 50% HP once per battle.

class_cards.name: Moonblade
class_cards.description: Empowered by lunar energy, its strikes glow with mystic light.
class_cards.passive: Heals self for 3 HP each turn when below 10 HP.

class_cards.name: Silverstreak
class_cards.description: Dashes swiftly through foes, leaving them off-balance.
class_cards.passive: Ignores 2 defense on each attack.

class_cards.name: Spellslinger
class_cards.description: Fires magical projectiles with consistent precision.
class_cards.passive: Launches an additional spell attack each turn.

class_cards.name: Houndmaster
class_cards.description: Commands loyal beasts in battle.
class_cards.passive: Summons a hound with 3 HP each turn.

class_cards.name: Celestial Warden
class_cards.description: A divine guardian channeling cosmic energy.
class_cards.passive: Reflects 5 damage to attackers.

class_cards.name: Windblade
class_cards.description: Swift and precise, delivering cutting strikes before foes react.
class_cards.passive: Gains a 10% attack bonus if attacked first.

class_cards.name: Bloodied Katana
class_cards.effect: Extra hit chance

class_cards.name: Enchanted Staff
class_cards.effect: Stun immunity pierce

class_cards.name: Alchemist Pistol
class_cards.effect: Ignites target

class_cards.name: Twin Blades of Mercy
class_cards.effect: Attacks twice per turn

class_cards.name: Heated War Pick
class_cards.effect: Ignore defense on armored enemies

class_cards.name: Gilded Recurve Bow
class_cards.effect: 20% Crit Chance

class_cards.name: Steamcoil Halberd
class_cards.effect: Extra damage to machines

class_cards.name: Crackling Tesla Baton
class_cards.effect: Jumps to nearby enemy

class_cards.name: Blacksteel Greatsword
class_cards.effect: Reduces enemy stats

class_cards.name: Inferno Howitzer
class_cards.effect: Burn spreads to nearby targets

class_cards.name: Clockwork Claws
class_cards.effect: Ignores block and barrier

class_cards.name: Royal Arm-Cannon
class_cards.effect: May stun all enemies

class_cards.name: Skybreaker Lance
class_cards.effect: Always hits flying enemies

class_cards.name: Graveyard World
class_cards.effect: Revive as Undead with 50% HP upon death; Undead gain +2 ATK
class_cards.description: Each time a character dies, 50% chance to revive as Undead at half health; Undead units gain +2 ATK.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Graveyard World, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Skyborn Citadel
class_cards.effect: Hobgoblin units gain +2 ATK
class_cards.description: All Hobgoblin units gain +2 ATK while this field is active.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Skyborn Citadel, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Forge of Cinders
class_cards.effect: Machines gain +1 ATK/DEF and ignore trap effects
class_cards.description: Machine units gain +1 ATK and +1 DEF and are immune to trap effects.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Forge of Cinders, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Beastcaller's Den
class_cards.effect: Beasts gain +1 ATK, cannot be feared; summon Level 1 Beast on Beast death
class_cards.description: Beast units gain +1 ATK and immunity to Fear; once per field, summon a Level 1 Beast when a Beast ally dies.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Beastcaller's Den, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Clockwork Wastes
class_cards.effect: Machines gain +1 ATK/DEF and ignore trap effects
class_cards.description: Machine units gain +1 ATK and +1 DEF and are immune to trap effects.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Clockwork Wastes, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Holy Sanctuary
class_cards.effect: Healing effects doubled; Undead take 2 damage at turn start
class_cards.description: All healing effects are doubled. Undead units take 2 damage at the start of their turn.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Holy Sanctuary, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Cursed Battlefield
class_cards.effect: Apply Plague: deal 2 damage to random enemy on each death
class_cards.description: Whenever a character dies, apply Plague to a random enemy, dealing 2 damage per turn for 2 turns.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Cursed Battlefield, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Mirror Realm
class_cards.effect: Reflect 25% of damage back to attacker
class_cards.description: All damage dealt by characters is reflected 25% back at the attacker.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Mirror Realm, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Arcane Academy
class_cards.effect: Draw an extra card on OnPlay
class_cards.description: When you play a card, draw one extra card.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Arcane Academy, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Frozen Tundra
class_cards.effect: Enemies take 1 cold damage at turn start; -1 SPD
class_cards.description: Enemies take 1 cold damage at the start of their turn and have -1 SPD.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Frozen Tundra, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Desert of Sands
class_cards.effect: Enemies take 1 burn damage when they attack
class_cards.description: Whenever an enemy attacks, they take 1 burn damage.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Desert of Sands, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Volcanic Ruins
class_cards.effect: Enemies take 1 burn damage when they attack
class_cards.description: Whenever an enemy attacks, they take 1 burn damage.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Volcanic Ruins, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Shadowfell
class_cards.effect: Nightshade units gain +2 ATK
class_cards.description: All Nightshade units gain +2 ATK while this field is active.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Shadowfell, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Radiant Grove
class_cards.effect: Human units gain +2 ATK
class_cards.description: All Human units gain +2 ATK while this field is active.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Radiant Grove, shaping all who stand within.

class_cards.name: Celestial Spire
class_cards.effect: Reflect 25% of damage back to attacker
class_cards.description: All damage dealt by characters is reflected 25% back at the attacker.
class_cards.flavor_text: The domain of Celestial Spire, shaping all who stand within.
